title.narrative: COMMUNICATION FOR DEVELOPMENT

description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Social And Behaviour Change, Cross-Sectoral - Social And Behaviour Change (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: New Element

description.narrative: The CO integrated C4D efforts into its programmatic work with a focus on i) an integrated cross-sectoral approach; ii) community-led interventions, with a special attention on youth association, for sustainable long-term impact; and iii) strengthening M&E and baseline collection mechanisms for better accountability. The CO provided technical and financial support to strengthening the knowledge and good practices and ultimately behavioral change in areas directly related to KRCs: ending open air defecation; nutrition, immunization ad other essential family practices; Covid19 prevention; quality education in a safe environment which respects IPC practices; protection of children against violence | Status:Met | As-of Date:02/02/2022
